website_summaries.verdict: Highly durable battle rope that will deliver a great workout for any type of exercise you're seeking.
pros: Heavy-duty handles that will not fray and that will make it easier to do your exercise routine
Available in lengths between 30 and 50 feet
With a 1.5-inch diameter, this battle rope is easier to handle for people of varying fitness levels
A 2-inch diameter rope is available in this model too
Lasts a long time when used in controlled weather environments
cons: Doesn't include any hardware for attaching battle rope to a wall

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited! Had two 10 minute indoor workouts with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received these on my door step 2 days ago. I was super excited! Had two 10 minute indoor workouts with these and this is what they look like. Which made me pretty upset. They have a great feel, just not sure how long they are going to last. I purchased the 1.5 40ft ropes. Rated 1 star for durbality. I'm scared of what they are gonna look like a month from today. If they'd even still be intact. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I loved doing many exercises pre-pregnancy and through my pregnancy with the battle ropes in my gym. Now that I am postpartum, I don't know how often I'll make it back to the gym so I researched battleropes for home! These are a great price, came in a matter of days, very well packaged, and I love them! While my little one (cat) naps, I can go outside and have a quick but effective workout. I just wrap the rope around a tree and get going. So glad I purchased these! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So it just arrived this week and on the early side of the stated delivery window. The quality appears to be good and the grips have a good feel to them. First workout in and no issues. I'll come back in January and update my review to see how it's holding up under the use of my family and I.
customer_reviews.author: CT SE HC

customer_reviews.title: I love to hate this rope
customer_reviews.text: I love to hate this rope, it is the cause of some very sore days but has stood the test of time and abuse. It has been holding strong for several months with a regular use of every other day with the exception of the holiday season were it was used a little less
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our gym. Very durable, has not weathered or unraveled. Will order from here again if we add more.

customer_reviews.title: I know when I woke up it felt like I got my ass whooped in my sleep so ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for a novice battle roper. I've never used them until I bought mine. I know when I woke up it felt like I got my ass whooped in my sleep so that means they are working...I think?

customer_reviews.title: Excellence!

customer_reviews.title: This rope is great. Quality material and grips are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got the 40' for my garage gym. Just set it up tonight and did 2 sets of about 10 seconds each. 5 mins ago. I am still winded. This rope is great. Quality material and grips are awesome. I can't wait to get busy on it

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the rope for a couple of months now along with a ring mounted to the base of a block wall. Rope is easy to hold and shows no sign of wear. Seems like a great value for the price so far.

customer_reviews.text: Rope workouts bring a new dynamic to your routine. Purchased these to add to home gym. These ropes are durable and great quality!

customer_reviews.title: Burnt

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: It's a rope, OK? Just as good as the ones at the world-class gym I go to, the black is super cool too. Not having any problems with the handles either. And the price is right. Not sure what else you could want from a piece of workout equipment.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it is something my husband and I can both enjoy. It is sub-zero here in WI and we ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Battle Ropes at a friend's house in the past and decided to give it a whirl. Hopefully it is something my husband and I can both enjoy. It is sub-zero here in WI and we await warmer days to give it a try. I expect to be completely satisfied with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product, exactly what I wanted for home cardio. Would recommend to anyone looking for some battle ropes at home. I was debating on 40-50 ft 40 takes up plenty of room in my basement.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong Rope. Only had it for one week ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong Rope. Only had it for one week so far but it's exactly what I've wanted to add some variety to my workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and well made. Will buy our next one from Titan Fitness as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: The battle ropes at my gym are 2" and 50ft. I'm a petite 5ft tall woman so had a difficult time with them even though it was the most intense workout I've ever done! I decided to buy these for home. They are perfect! They came well packaged and seem to be very good quality. They are well wound and don't kink. I would have liked a sleeve for the area that wraps around the support post but I can make something out of scraps of fabric I have. For the price, I don't think you can beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: Battle Rope goodness
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Very sturdy. Heavy rope. Kids love it, wife loves it, I love it. Nice workout. I would by again if this thing were to ever wear out. I don't see it happening though. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Byrd

product_meta.title: TITAN Battle Ropes for Slams, Waves, and Throws, Strength Training Equipment
feature_bullets: BUILD MUSCLE: Battle ropes are an excellent way to tone your arms, chest, shoulders, and core, making it a great upper body workout. With Titan Battle Ropes, you’ll see results in no time! Watch as your body grows more lean, muscular, and chiseled thanks to this amazing piece of exercise equipment. Add it to your fitness gear today!

PERFORM DIFFERENT EXERCISES: With our battle ropes, you can perform a variety of exercises. Use the ropes for lifting exercises like waves, throws, and slams. These exercises allow you to build muscle in your triceps, biceps, deltoids, and rhomboids. You can also do shoulder presses and snakes to tone and tighten your core. Get ripped and shredded with pull ropes by Titan Fitness!

COMFORTABLE GRIPS: Without proper handles, you could seriously injure your hands. That’s the last thing you want! Keep your palms blister- and callus-free with our conditioning ropes. They feature long comfortable handles that give you a firm grip while you work out. These high-quality handles won’t come undone either, making them long-lasting and durable.

HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: At Titan Fitness, we believe in making our products an investment worthy of your time and money. That’s why we use only the highest caliber of materials for our fitness gear and equipment — these battle ropes are no exception. They’re made from poly-dacron, so they won’t fray or leave fibers on your floor. They’re also conveniently water-resistant.

DIMENSIONS: We offer a variety of ropes to accommodate all your fitness needs. You can choose ropes that measure 30’, 40’, or 50’ in length. They weigh anywhere from 19 to 47 lbs. These ropes have a diameter of either 1 1/2" or 2”. All ropes come in black and are made from poly-dacron. Order these battling ropes for your home gym today!
